local_intent: While gripping the dishwasher handle, pull back 0.2 m to open the hinged door, confirming the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped and aligned; workspace allows a 0.2 m pull.
coherence_with_global: Implements the global step Retreat(distance=0.2, timeout_ms=1500) during the door-opening sequence, ensuring grasp stability afterward.
